DuergarBoatAtCave.synopsis: Dialogue when clicking on boat in cave to reach Grymforge. Player can stay or cross. This dialogue only appears once player has already been to Grymforge.
DuergarBoatAtCave.how_to_trigger: Repro steps (will only work with new game):1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Use debug book - go to region - act 1 - underdark - lone duergar4. Use the Recon command: "setOnstage S_UND_DuergarCamp_BoatAtCave"6. goto -16.45, 0.50, -235.737. Click on the boat.

CINE_RaftApproaching.synopsis: We see a raft with duergar approaching our raft.

RaftEvent.synopsis: The players use a boat to reach the duergar camp. In the middle of the lake, they are confronted by a group of duergar on a raft. Being Drow/Duergar changes the tone of the conversation and makes the persuasion event easier. Having the mark of the Absolute can also make the persuasion event easier.
RaftEvent.how_to_trigger: Go to X:0 , Y:-205 (goto 0, -205)Click on boat at dockWill play after departing cinematic

Boat.synopsis: Raft dialogue. The player can decide either to sail somewhere or to walk away from the raft.
Boat.how_to_trigger: Go to X: -10  Y: -210Click on boat

DuergarBoatAtCamp.synopsis: Dialogue when clciking boat in Grymforge to reach the other side of the lake. Player can cross or stay.
DuergarBoatAtCamp.how_to_trigger: Repro steps (will only work with new game):1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. Use debug book - go to region - act 1 - underdark - lone duergar4. Use the Recon command: "setOnstage S_UND_DuergarCamp_BoatAtCave"6. goto -16.45, 0.50, -235.737. Click on the boat and then when in camp click again on the boat on the left.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Looking at the session descriptions we can deduce a couple of temporal or causal links. First, the Duergar boat sessions occur in two different locations. The 'DuergarBoatAtCave' dialogue – which is triggered when clicking on the boat in a cave to reach Grymforge – will only appear after the player has already been to Grymforge. In our available sessions the only dialogue clearly set in Grymforge is 'DuergarBoatAtCamp' (triggered by clicking on the boat in Grymforge). This suggests that the Grymforge boat event (DuergarBoatAtCamp) must occur before the cave dialogue (DuergarBoatAtCave). Second, regarding the raft-related sessions, the cinematic 'CINE_RaftApproaching' shows a raft with duergar approaching and is intended to set the stage for the ensuing confrontation described in 'RaftEvent' (which plays after a departing cinematic). This provides a clear ordering in which the cinematic must happen before the actual event dialogue. There is no clear evidence of mutually exclusive occurrences among these sessions – the sessions we see appear to belong to different segments or branches of the journey. (Note that in a full game path there might be branch choices, but given the descriptions provided, we list only ordering constraints.)

DuergarBoatAtCave_0.speaker: Narrator
DuergarBoatAtCave_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Boat sits in the water

DuergarBoatAtCave_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Party boards the boat. Player sees the boat sail for a few seconds from the shore with the party on board.InternalNodeContext: Cinematic needs to be few seconds, a single node. Just to establish we're going through a long journey from A to B.

RaftEvent_15.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_15.text: You there! Drow! Why are you in Gekh's raft?

RaftEvent_17.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_17.text: We aren't expecting more of you. Where's Gekh? Who are you?

RaftEvent_119.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_119.text: I saw a body left by the myconids - your 'Gekh' must be dead.

RaftEvent_36.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_36.text: Damn it. Gekh's gone and screwed up. If he's dead, so's the squad.

RaftEvent_86.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_86.text: Move over - I'll take you to shore. You're the one telling the sergeant what happened.

RaftEvent_80.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_80.text: You lot - keep patrollin'. I'm headin' back with this one.

RaftEvent_135.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_135.text: The whole squad? Damn it. Gekh's gone and screwed up. Nere'll lose his head over this.

RaftEvent_127.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_127.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

RaftEvent_121.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_121.text: I'm afraid Gekh is dead - he fell fighting the myconids.

RaftEvent_110.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_110.text: Just let me cross - I have the brand, see?

RaftEvent_11.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_11.text: Reach out to the duergar's parasite.

RaftEvent_53.speaker: Narrator
RaftEvent_53.text: *Your parasite stirs briefly, then goes still. The duergar is not infected.*
RaftEvent_53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

RaftEvent_95.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_95.text: Hold up, boys. We got a deep gnome here - and rowing Gekh's raft, no less.

RaftEvent_1.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_1.text: You got guts floating out here like this. Where's Gekh? Who are you?

RaftEvent_98.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_98.text: You! What are you doing on Gekh's raft?

RaftEvent_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Another raft approaches. The Duergar on board pilot it next ot the player's craft. Novice Greymond stands opposite the player, the tiny gap between the boats seperating them.

RaftEvent_115.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_115.text: I work on Gekh's behalf. I'm after his sergeant's stolen boots.

RaftEvent_29.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_29.text: Ho! How desperate is the cur, to make an ally of a topsider?

RaftEvent_103.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_103.text: I will tell you now what the sergeant told Gekh: until you have the boots, you will not cross.

RaftEvent_13.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_13.text: Come back empty-handed again, and you're feeding the fishes.

RaftEvent_116.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_116.text: Boat back to the grotto shore.

RaftEvent_71.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_71.text: Push the duergar into the water.

RaftEvent_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Player pushes Graymon into the water

RaftEvent_131.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_131.text: Raise your weapon. I mean to pass now!

RaftEvent_0.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_0.text: I seek the sergeant - I believe she's keen to get these boots back.

RaftEvent_42.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_42.text: Well I'll be - you got them. The sergeant's been whining non-stop.

RaftEvent_105.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_105.text: What about Gekh? Where's he at?

RaftEvent_33.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_33.text: He stayed behind to tie up some loose ends.

RaftEvent_58.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_58.text: But he let you go, eh? Suppose he figured the sergeant could sort you out.

RaftEvent_8.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_8.text: More like avoiding the sergeant, I reckon.

RaftEvent_2.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_2.text: Come on - let's get you to shore. You're the one telling the sergeant what happened.

RaftEvent_62.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_62.text: The rest of you - keep patrolling. I'll be heading back with this one.

RaftEvent_120.speaker: Narrator
RaftEvent_120.text: *You continue forward in silence until the lights of a camp twinkle through the murk.*

RaftEvent_108.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_108.text: He's dead. The myconids saw to that.

RaftEvent_74.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_74.text: You don't know Gekh? How'd you... ugh, whatever - I don't care.

RaftEvent_107.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_107.text: The shite-brain's off shirking his duties somewhere.

RaftEvent_12.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_12.text: Avoiding the sergeant, is he? Can't blame him. She mentioned something 'bout biting his toes off.

RaftEvent_66.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_66.text: MOVE YOUR BOAT, OR SINK. MAKE THE CHOICE.

RaftEvent_81.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_81.text: All right, all right. No reason to get your tongue in a twist.

RaftEvent_97.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_97.text: In the name of the Absolute - you will let me pass.

RaftEvent_52.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_52.text: The Absolute? Not bloody likely. Get them, fellas!

RaftEvent_136.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_136.text: I saw a body left by the myconids - your 'Gekh' must be dead.

RaftEvent_46.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_46.text: I'm afraid Gekh is dead - he fell fighting the myconids.

RaftEvent_22.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_22.text: Damn - the sergeant'll be pissed 'bout her boots.

RaftEvent_34.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_34.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

RaftEvent_93.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_93.text: Just let me cross - I have the brand, see?

RaftEvent_76.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_76.text: All right, all right. No reason to get your tongue in a twist.

RaftEvent_4.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_4.text: Well, come on. Let's get you to shore. You'll need to report to the sergeant.

RaftEvent_70.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_70.text: I don't care what you've got scrawled on your skin. I don't like your face.

RaftEvent_102.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_102.text: Godsdamned dwarf. What are you doing on Gekh's raft?

RaftEvent_23.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_23.text: Duergar, like you? Saw his body a way back. Myconids got him.

RaftEvent_56.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_56.text: Damn it. The sergeant'll be pissed about her boots.

RaftEvent_106.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_106.text: Come on, hoon. You're coming with me. I won't be the one to tell the sergeant what happened.

RaftEvent_51.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_51.text: She just loves your sort, you see. Real keen on deep gnomes. Heh.
RaftEvent_51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from his boat to the player's boat at end of line.NodeContext: Should sound quite ominous.

RaftEvent_20.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_20.text: The rest of you - keep patrolling. I'll head back with this one.

RaftEvent_90.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_90.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

RaftEvent_129.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_129.text: I'm afraid Gekh is dead. He fell fighting the myconids.

RaftEvent_63.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_63.text: See this brand? Let me pass.

RaftEvent_16.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_16.text: I don't care what you've got scrawled on your skin. I don't like your face.

RaftEvent_125.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_125.text: You again? Show me the boots, or face the Absolute's judgement.

RaftEvent_25.speaker: Corsair Greymon
RaftEvent_25.text: Did I not warn you? Slice 'em up, fellas!

RaftEvent_6.speaker: Player
RaftEvent_6.text: Here they are, safe and sound.

Boat_10.speaker: Narrator
Boat_10.context: InternalNodeContext: ~Should share sequence with *A vessel wobbles on the lake's murky waters.*

Boat_8.speaker: Player
Boat_8.context: InternalNodeContext: First time using the boat, sailing to the camp

CinematicNodeContext: ~The player departs from the Myconid beach and pilots the raft out into the underground lake

Boat_12.speaker: Player
Boat_12.text: Set out for the duergar camp.

Boat_14.speaker: Narrator
Boat_14.context: InternalNodeContext: ~Should share sequence with *A vessel wobbles on the lake's murky waters.*

Boat_9.speaker: Player
Boat_9.text: Board and sail to the cave shore.

Boat_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player departs from the Duergar Fortress and pilots the raft out into the underground lake

Boat_15.speaker: Narrator
Boat_15.text: *A vessel wobbles on the lake's murky waters.*

Boat_1.speaker: Player
Boat_1.text: Continue your journey across the lake.
Boat_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Sailing to the camp after the lake fight

Boat_17.speaker: Player
Boat_17.context: InternalNodeContext: Sailing back to the cave after the lake fight

CinematicNodeContext: ~The player pilots the raft about to head back the way it came
~[EA: Treat this like it's propelled by sails, there is not rowing or special animations for this]
